text: Meroles cuneirostris, the wedge-snouted sand lizard or wedge-snouted desert lizard, is a species of sand-dwelling lizard in the family Lacertidae. It occurs in the Namib Desert of Namibia and South Africa. ==References== cuneirostris Category:Reptiles of Namibia Category:Reptiles of South Africa Category:Reptiles described in 1867 Category:Taxa named by Alexander Strauch
title: Meroles cuneirostris
